FuncDef:
The display boardinfo pdu-backplane command displays manufacturing information about a PDU backplane.
The display boardinfo power-backplane command displays manufacturing information about a power backplane.
The display boardinfo command displays board manufacturing information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Eeprom num.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 24 .

Board type.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 31 .

The available id string.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 30 .

Specifies a chassis ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Getting board information from MonitorBus, please wait...
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display boardinfo command can be used to view manufacturing information about a board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
